thread.title: Ryan Gosling Staring at Candy Falling From the Ceiling at the Oscars Is All of Us
thread.title_full: Ryan Gosling Staring at Candy Falling From the Ceiling at the Oscars Is All of Us

author: Erin Cullum
title: Ryan Gosling Staring at Candy Falling From the Ceiling at the Oscars Is All of Us
text:
Candy Falling at the Oscars 2017 Ryan Gosling Staring at Candy Falling From the Ceiling at the Oscars Is All of Us February 26, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Ryan Gosling Staring at Candy Falling From the Ceiling at the Oscars Is All of Us 
Jimmy Kimmel has officially raised the bar as an Oscars host, and every host going forward will have to bring candy. As he was preparing to introduce another award presenter, the late night host said, "You can't really have movies without candy." "It's un-American," he said. "Yeah, popcorn is, too, but we don't have that." And with that, as the audience likely nodded in agreement, candy began to fall from the ceiling like magic — and gave us serious Hunger Games vibes (but with a happy ending, of course). Bags of Red Vines and Junior Mints tied up with a bow fell from the theater's ceiling into the crowd members' laps, and their reactions are straight-up priceless. You'll relate to Ryan Gosling on an emotional level as you see his loving gaze, plus more celebs' hilarious reactions, ahead.
